name: HMM - Killer J Pack
detailed_description:
---
DLCs packs to be temporarily unavailable for purchase

Due to the Combat Test, which will start on February 14th, the sales of all DLCs will be suspended in the same period. During this testing phase, we will focus on balance and core gameplay changes to optimize the player’s experience.

What if I’ve already purchased?
If you have already purchased one of the packs, there is no need to worry about it. You will not lose anything. Despite the removal of the DLCs from the store, everything goes back to normal after the testing period, for both those who have purchased or wish to become a Heavy Metal Machines’ founder.

The DLCs are coming back right after we have all characters reimplemented, at the end of the Combat Test.

Heavy Metal Machines Team
---



Our newest character, Killer J is a jokester of all sorts! Not only does he have some explosive moves, but he can literally misdirect opponents into barriers, lava, and even into each other! With his DLC, you get to play him right now… as well as bragging rights due to this having 1 (one) Rockstar skin for his vehicle included.

This DLC unlocks Killer J when you purchase it, adding the machine to your account forever. It also includes a brand new Skin for the character. Both the Character and the Skin are available at the in-game store. This DLC bundle is being sold at roughly a 30% discount compared to buying both items separately.

You can check what Killer J is all about in his website.

To sum it up, this pack includes:
  • Killer J
  • A Rockstar skin [Race to Jokstruction]

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics HD 4000 or Nvidia GT 620
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Required
